searchableTitle: Jurassic World Rebirth Jurassic World 4 JW Rebirth

title: Voldemort: Origins of the Heir
searchableTitle: Voldemort: Origins of the Heir Harry Potter Prequel Tom Riddle Origins
description: While initially a fan project, HBO's upcoming Harry Potter reboot series has sparked renewed interest in the origins of Tom Riddle. This entry tracks the anticipated 2026 window for the Wizarding World's return with a focus on young Tom Riddle's transformation into Lord Voldemort.

title: Superman
searchableTitle: Superman Superman: Legacy Superman (2025)
description: Directed by James Gunn, this film follows Clark Kent as he reconciles his Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing in Smallville, Kansas. He is the embodiment of truth, justice, and a better tomorrow in a world that views kindness as old-fashioned.

episodes.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part Two

searchableTitle: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish Puss in Boots 2 The Last Wish

episodes.title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish

title: Top Gun: Maverick
searchableTitle: Top Gun: Maverick Top Gun 2 Top Gun Maverick
description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

title: Attack on Titan
japaneseTitle: 進撃の巨人
searchableTitle: Attack on Titan Shingeki no Kyojin 進撃の巨人 AOT The Advancing Giant SnK
description: Centuries ago, mankind was slaughtered to near extinction by monstrous humanoid creatures called Titans. Humanity survives within three massive walls. After a Colossal Titan breaches the outer wall, young Eren Jaeger vows to exterminate every Titan.

episodes.title: To You, in 2000 Years: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 1
episodes.description: Eren Yeager lives in the town of Shiganshina, located within the outermost of three circular walls protecting humanity from Titans.

episodes.title: That Day: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 2
episodes.description: Eren watches in horror as his mother is eaten by a Titan. He vows to kill all Titans.

episodes.title: A Dim Light Amid Despair: Humanity's Comeback, Part 1
episodes.description: Five years after the fall of Wall Maria, Eren, Mikasa, and Armin graduate from the Training Corps.

episodes.title: Beast Titan
episodes.description: The Scout Regiment discovers a new type of Titan and deals with the aftermath of the battle of Trost District.

episodes.title: I'm Home
episodes.description: The Scouts return to the destroyed Shiganshina district, and Eren confronts his past.

episodes.title: Warrior
episodes.description: Reiner reveals his true identity as the Armored Titan to Eren.

episodes.title: Smoke Signal
episodes.description: The Scout Regiment faces a conspiracy within the walls as the Central Military Police targets Historia.

episodes.title: Pain
episodes.description: Erwin is captured by the Military Police, and Levi's squad plans a rescue mission.

episodes.title: Old Story
episodes.description: Kenny Ackerman's backstory is revealed as the battle for the Reiss family continues.

episodes.title: The Other Side of the Ocean
episodes.description: The story shifts to Marley, revealing Reiner's life and the Warrior candidates.

episodes.title: Midnight Train
episodes.description: Reiner and Zeke return to Liberio, and the War Hammer Titan is introduced.

episodes.title: The Door of Hope
episodes.description: Eren infiltrates Marley as a wounded soldier and meets a young boy named Falco.

episodes.title: Judgement
episodes.description: The battle in Liberio continues as Eren faces the War Hammer Titan.

episodes.title: Sneak Attack
episodes.description: The Scouts launch an attack on the Marleyan military during the festival.

episodes.title: Two Brothers
episodes.description: Eren and Zeke reunite in Paths, revealing their plan to use the Founding Titan's power.

episodes.title: The Rumbling
episodes.description: Eren initiates the Rumbling, unleashing thousands of Colossal Titans to flatten the world outside Paradis.

episodes.title: The Last Attack
episodes.description: The final battle to stop Eren's Rumbling reaches its climax as the remaining Scouts make their last stand.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Season 1

description: After a demon attack leaves his family slaughtered and his sister Nezuko transformed into a demon, young Tanjiro Kamado joins the Demon Slayer Corps to find a cure and hunt down the progenitor of all demons, Muzan Kibutsuji.

episodes.title: Cruelty
episodes.description: Tanjiro returns home to find his family slaughtered by demons, with only his sister Nezuko surviving but transformed into a demon.

episodes.title: Trainer Sakonji Urokodaki
episodes.description: Tanjiro meets Sakonji Urokodaki, a former Hashira who agrees to train him to become a Demon Slayer.

episodes.title: Sabito and Makomo
episodes.description: During his training, Tanjiro encounters Sabito and Makomo, two spirits who help him master the sword techniques.

episodes.title: Yoriichi Type Zero

episodes.title: Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc
episodes.description: Denji falls for the enigmatic Reze, not knowing she is a lethal hybrid assassin. Their relationship triggers a catastrophic battle involving the Typhoon Devil and forces Denji to question trust and desire[citation:1].

title: Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc
japaneseTitle: 劇場版 チェンソーマン レゼ篇
searchableTitle: Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc Gekijō-ban Chensō Man Reze-hen 劇場版 チェンソーマン レゼ篇 Reze Arc
description: A direct sequel to the first season, the film follows Denji as he navigates his life as a hybrid devil hunter. His peaceful days are interrupted when he meets Reze, a mysterious girl working at a local cafe. What starts as a budding romance quickly spirals into a high-stakes battle as Reze's true identity as the Bomb Devil is revealed, leading to an explosive confrontation that tests Denji's heart and resolve.
